title: DHFWS Darjeeling Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 District Coordinator Posts
description: The District Health and Family Welfare Society, Darjeeling. (DHFES Darjeeeling) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 District Coordinator Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation and PGDM can apply for the DHFWS Darjeeling Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
